statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-21 \, x^{3} - 23 \, x^{2} + 22 \, x - 14 , -3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 1 , 5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 4 , -21 \, x^{3} - 23 \, x^{2} + 22 \, x - 14 , -11 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
